name: The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Nebula Realm
name_original: The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Nebula Realm
description:
The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Nebula Realm is a strategy game developed by Ubisoft Montreal and Blue Byte. It was originally released in 2005. It was published by Ubisoft Entertainment. Most rawgers rated the game as "Recommended".
You can play The Settlers: Heritage of Kings - Nebula Realm on PC.
